data.oai_dc:dc: Column 1: growth category, as in Table 2 of paper, Column 2: treatment (c= control, t1= one defoliation, t2= two defoliations), Column 3: harvest (harvests 1-6), Column 4: carbohydrate concentration (mass spectrometry counts), Column 5: total taproot carbohydrates (mass spectrometer counts)
